schema.title: Cw721

minter.description: The minter is the only one who can create new NFTs. This is designed for a base NFT that is controlled by an external program or contract. You will likely replace this with custom logic in custom NFTs

allOf.description:
An address that can be used within the Andromeda ecosystem. Inspired by the cosmwasm-std `Addr` type. https://github.com/CosmWasm/cosmwasm/blob/2a1c698520a1aacedfe3f4803b0d7d653892217a/packages/std/src/addresses.rs#L33

This address can be one of two things: 1. A valid human readable address e.g. `cosmos1...` 2. A valid Andromeda VFS path e.g. `/home/user/app/component`

VFS paths can be local in the case of an app and can be done by referencing `./component` they can also contain protocols for cross chain communication. A VFS path is usually structured as so:

`<protocol>://<chain (required if ibc used)>/<path>` or `ibc://cosmoshub-4/user/app/component`

items.description: A Module is a component that can be attached to an ADO, enhancing its functionality by adding specific features or capabilities, like keeping a list of addresses or adding a royalty rate.

schema.description: Allows users to launch their own custom NFT projects.

ui:options.title: Token/NFT Name
ui:options.description: Enter the official name of the token or NFT. Use only letters for the name.

ui:options.title: Token/NFT Symbol
ui:options.description: Specify a unique symbol for the token or NFT. It should contain only letters and be 3 to 12 characters long.

ui:options.title: Minter Address
ui:options.description: Input the wallet address responsible for minting tokens. Use your own wallet address if you will retain minting rights.

ui:options.title: Identifier Address
ui:options.description: Provide the address or name of a specific Andromeda Digital Object (ADO) within an app.
ui:options.help: Can be either an address or app component name of a specific ADO within an app

ui:options.title: Selected Modules
ui:options.description: Optionally attach Andromeda Modules such as rates or address-list to the contract.

ui:options.title: Module Address
ui:options.description: Enter the address (e.g, andr1v...) or name of the specific ADO module (e.g, ./rates) you wish to attach.

alerts.text: Only 'rates' and 'address-list' modules are currently permitted.

ui:options.title: Module Type
ui:options.description: Select the type of module to add. Currently compatible: 'rates','address-list'

ui:options.title: Module Mutability
ui:options.description: Indicate if the module can be modified post-deployment. Check the box for yes.

ui:options.title: Module Name
ui:options.description: An optional name or tile for the module. Primarily for orginzational usage.
